snippet: With “Fela!” carving a place in the mainstream for Afrobeat music, the Brooklyn band Antibalas renews its drive to reach the spotlight.
abstract: Brooklyn band Antibalas renews its drive to reach the spotlight, and to bring the Afrobeat sound to a larger audience; band is looking to capitalize on the momentum the genre is experiencing and has returned to Brooklyn to record its latest album.
lead_paragraph: With “Fela!” carving a place in the mainstream for Afrobeat music, the Brooklyn band Antibalas renews its drive to reach the spotlight.

headline.seo: Antibalas, Afrobeat Band, Hopes for Post-‘Fela!’ Audience
headline.main: Waiting in Brooklyn for the World to Catch Up
headline.print_headline: Waiting in Brooklyn for the World to Catch Up
